StructureDefinition-Extension-CareConnect-RelatedProblemHeader-1

A reference to another related problem header condition (target) whose relationship is defined by the relationship type code.

Profile Minimum Viable Content (MVC)

The following elements are mandatory in this extension (i.e. MUST be present):

  1. target

Formal Views of Profile Content

Description of Profiles, Differentials, and Snapshots.

The official URL for this profile is: https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/Extension-CareConnect-RelatedProblemHeader-1

Published on Thu Jun 27 00:00:00 BST 2019 as draft by HL7 UK.

This profile builds on Extension
